data.title: Singer & Songerwriter
data.text:
Welcome to Bob Thomas' Web site, singer and songwriter of western music. Please Enjoy...

• His song âAmericaâ was selected a finalist in the 19th annual International Acoustic Music Awards.

• His song âCowboy Bluesâ was a finalist in the World Songwriting Award contest in 2021.

• His song âShadowsâ was a finalist in the World Songwriting Award contest in 2018.

• His song âThe Cowboyâ was selected as a finalist for the 2012 Western Writers of America for best western song.

Scott Wikle of My Kind of Country MKOCradio.com said of Bob Thomas "he is the Bob Dylan of Western Music".
